channel.title: Help with Run.bat and Core.bat on 604 server!
channel.description:
Hello people i have bought a vps for 3days ago and now am i'm hosting my friends 604 server so yesterday when i downloaded his source to start host it, it came this texts in the RunServer.bat
Preparing... A subdirectory or file bin already exists. The system cannot find the file specified. The system cannot find the file specified. Compiling core... The system cannot find the path specified. completed... running server... 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
and here is the text from Core.Bat
Preparing... A subdirectory or file bin already exists. The system cannot find the file specified. The system cannot find the file specified. Compiling core... The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .
My msn: Theskillhead@hotmail.com using: www.teamviewer.com

item.title: Help with Run.bat and Core.bat on 604 server!
item.dc:creator: @E_d_e_n1 E_d_e_n
item.description:
@E_d_e_n1 wrote:

Well, im not 100% sure lol but it looks as if you dont have java on your vps.

make sure you download and install these
www.java.com - java download
http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html - jdk download links

if you have not done this already its probably your problem. if you have done these im not sure

also once you download jdk make sure if in your run.bat and core if it has anything like this in it, change it to your version of jdk
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26

change the 26 to yoru version

Read full topic
item.source: Help with Run.bat and Core.bat on 604 server!
